casebody.data:
William H. Wilson v. Department of Public Utility Control et al. (11959)

Lavery, Freedman and Spear, Js.

Argued May 4 decision released May 24, 1994 JohnL. Laudati, with whom, on the brief, was Philip N. Walker, for the appellant (plaintiff). Tatiana D. Sypko, assistant attorney general, with whom were Robert S. Golden, Jr., assistant attorney general, and, on the brief, Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, for the appellee (named defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
